name: Ai! Ai! The Spacelord is Trapped!
name_original: Ai! Ai! The Spacelord is Trapped!
description:
I'm making a game every month in 2019. In April I made this, and it might still see the light of day as part of another Bitsy Mystery Dungeon collaboration, but I'm preserving it here for posterity, and so that people don't think I somehow skipped a month of my project!

You can find out more about the Spacelord here.
